text: Arau ma'i tomalokaka yi jiraika dana karaicho tomalokara ocarata mrtyu ahara agate tara paraa byaya karaa, (karana mrtyu ahara pichata si ka’ba) he mora pratipalaka! ‘Moka arau kichu samayara babe arakasa dile ma'i chadakba karailohemtena arau satkarmaparaayanasakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena’
